question: Mickey the mouse and his friends found mushrooms growing in the first clearing. Skip count by 5s to find out how many mushrooms they found in total.
They discovered acorns in the first part of the forest. Skip count by 5s to find out how many acorns they find in total.
As Mickey explored, he found colourful flowers in a clearing. Skip count by 5s to find out how many flowers he saw in the clearings.
Mickey and his friends noticed bird nests in trees. Skip count by 5s to discover how many nests they find in total.
Mickey spotted 5 pinecones scattered under each tree. Skip count by 5s to figure out how many pinecones there are in total.
